page.title: 09EMERGENCY SERVICES
page.content:
POLICE:The area which the three policemen cover is about a quarter the area patrolled by the London Metro- politan Police.
This area stretches fromthe western side of Loch Tay to Logierait. People aged 15-25 cause most trouble but young offenders are usually deterred by warnings.The two cells at the station have been used twice in the last five years.
Driving laws are broken most.There are not many road accidents.Occasionally, serious accidents occur on the A9 trunk road 10 miles to the east which carries traffic to the north of Scotland.
